td.content: s:patient indicates severe rib tenderness, fatigue, severe stiffness and Body Aches. pt is a 76 year old white female. o:Height 60 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 97.7 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Neuro = Motor: 3/5 strength throughout, DTRs:2+ throughout, sensation = decrease sensation over right lateral leg and dorsum of the foot, straight leg test: (+) a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt c/o 3 days h/o fatigue, severe stiffness, severe rib tenderness and Body Aches. NKDA. she is a 76 yo female retired. denies any smoking she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 61 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, Neuro = Motor: 3/5 strength throughout, DTRs:2+ throughout, sensation = decrease sensation over right lateral leg and dorsum of the foot, straight leg test: (+) a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Foraminotomy - L4, L5.

s:a 76 YO F presents with fatigue, severe rib tenderness. she has history of severe stiffness. o:Height 60 in, Weight 202 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16, Extremities = no edema or cyanosis, normal range of motion B/L a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt presents with severe stiffness, fatigue and severe rib tenderness. These symptoms are present for about 11 days. she is a white female aged 76 yrs. o:Height 61 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Neuro = Motor: 3/5 strength throughout, DTRs:2+ throughout, sensation = decrease sensation over right lateral leg and dorsum of the foot, straight leg test: (+) a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed hydrocodone (Vicodin) - 5 mg 1 tab po q 4h prn.
